docPage.title: Sidesheet

headerOptions.name: headerOptions

header.name: header
header.description:
header component to be used as sidesheet header.
close button is not part of header so it will not be replaced.

stickFooter.name: stickFooter
stickFooter.description: Determines if footer is sticked at bottom

seperator.name: seperator
seperator.description: Show dividers in the header and the footer.
